author: prestonc
msg: Created a special case for printing 0 in normal form for float and double.

author: tabish
msg: Instead of locking on the PList iterator which forces a lock on every access to hasNext we should lock down at the PageFile level in readPage making the seek and read an atomic operation.  Since many reads on a single already loaded page don't need to be synchronized we pay a higher price for locking in the specific PList case than we do buy creating this atomic read operation in PageFile.

author: marvin
msg: Have OS_remove() return true on success, false on failure.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-6631 TestHMasterRPCException in 0.92 failed twice on socket timeout
